name: Mars Reject
intro: A frontend-focused project replicating the Mars Rejects website. It demonstrates advanced animations, user interactions, and responsive design.
title: Exploration of the Mars Rejects Universe
description: This project focuses on recreating the frontend experience of the Mars Rejects website. It highlights responsive design, complex animations using GSAP, and efficient layout management with CSS Grid and Flexbox. The clone is fully interactive, mimicking the original siteâ€™s UI/UX elements.

name: Sombra Network
intro: A responsive and visually dynamic platform developed to enhance user interaction and experience.
title: Crafting a Dynamic User Experience for Sombra Network
description: This project focuses on the frontend development of the Sombra Network Official Website. It features smooth animations using GSAP, responsive design with CSS Grid and Flexbox, and an interactive user interface. The website emphasizes usability and aesthetics, providing a seamless experience across various devices.

name: FlyMasters
intro: A platform for students to acquire scholarships and loans for studying abroad, featuring engaging animations.
title: Passport to Global Education
description: This project focuses on the frontend development of FlyMasters, a platform aimed at helping students navigate scholarship and loan options for international education. The website features smooth animations and a responsive design that enhances user interaction. Key technologies include React for dynamic rendering, GSAP for engaging animations, and CSS for a visually appealing layout. The platform prioritizes user experience, ensuring intuitive navigation and accessibility across devices.

name: My Portfolio
intro: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Sint voluptates vitae deserunt quidem! Nisi, ipsum!
title: A Self-Contained Showcase of My Work
description: This portfolio features a dynamic interface that invites users to explore various sections represented by a galaxy theme. Each section is accessible through interactive elements that enhance the user experience, allowing for smooth transitions and animations. Built using GSAP for animations and Three.js for the visual framework, the portfolio combines creative design with technical execution, showcasing the projects in a visually appealing way.

name: Monkeytype
intro: A clone of the popular typing website Monkeytype, designed to enhance typing skills.
title: Master Your Typing Skills
description: This project is a clone of the renowned typing website Monkeytype, focusing on improving typing speed and accuracy. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering, MongoDB for data management, and Tailwind CSS for styling, it provides a responsive and user-friendly interface. The application also incorporates Chart.js to visualize typing statistics, allowing users to track their progress over time. This project emphasizes performance and usability, delivering a seamless experience for users aiming to refine their typing abilities.

techStack.name: Next.js
techStack.tooltip: A React framework for building server-side rendered and static web applications, enabling optimized performance and SEO benefits.

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.tooltip: A NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents, allowing for easy scalability and complex queries.
